text: Please see not only harmful effects of #hydroxycholorquine (34% death increase) and #chloroquine (by 37%) in monotherapy in #Covid19 pts but beneficial effects of #ACE #inhibitors (reduction by 47%) and #statins (by 21%)- in line with our #insilico data.  https://t.co/hza6TFfXl7 https://t.co/mfoLwnbLap
